parameters.name: InsertType
parameters.description: Features for which to insert center marks as defined in swAutoInsertCenterMarkTypes_e

parameters.name: InsertOption
parameters.description: Center mark options as defined in swCenterMarkConnectionLine_e

parameters.name: LinearSlotCenter
parameters.description: True to add center marks to slot centers, false to add them to slot ends

parameters.name: ArcSlotCenter
parameters.description: True to add center marks to arc centers, false to add them to arc ends

parameters.name: UseDocumentDefaults
parameters.description: True to use the display settings specified in Tools > Options > Document Properties > Centerlines/Center Marks , false to use the display settings set by this method

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Size of center mark; valid only if UseDocumentDefaults is false

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.description: Size of gap between the center mark and extension line; valid only if UseDocumentDefaults is false and the Tools > Options > Document Properties > Centerlines/Center Marks > Scale by view scale check box is clear (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ExtendedLines
parameters.description: True to extend lines from center mark points, false to not; valid only if UseDocumentDefaults is false

parameters.name: CenterLineFont
parameters.description: True to use the centerline font, false to not; valid only if UseDocumentDefaults is false

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Rotation angle for the center mark; a positive angle rotates the center mark counterclockwise

title: IView.AutoInsertCenterMarks2
description: Automatically inserts the specified center marks in this view.
signature:

   System.Int32
InsertType
,
   System.Int32
InsertOption
,

LinearSlotCenter

Gap

ExtendedLines
,

CenterLineFont
,
   System.Double
Angle
)

parameters.name: InsertType
parameters.description: Features for which to insert center marks as defined in swAutoInsertCenterMarkTypes_e

parameters.name: InsertOption
parameters.description: Center mark options as defined in swCenterMarkConnectionLine_e

parameters.name: LinearSlotCenter
parameters.description: True to add center marks to slot centers, false to add them to slot ends

parameters.name: ArcSlotCenter
parameters.description: True to add center marks to arc centers, false to add them to arc ends

parameters.name: UseDocumentDefaults
parameters.description: True to use the display settings specified in Tools > Options > Document Properties > Centerlines/Center Marks , false to use the display settings set by this method

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Size of center mark; valid only if UseDocumentDefaults is false

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.description: Size of gap between the center mark and extension line; valid only if UseDocumentDefaults is false and the Tools > Options > Document Properties > Centerlines/Center Marks > Scale by view scale check box is clear (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ExtendedLines
parameters.description: True to extend lines from center mark points, false to not; valid only if UseDocumentDefaults is false

parameters.name: CenterLineFont
parameters.description: True to use the centerline font, false to not; valid only if UseDocumentDefaults is false

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Rotation angle for the center mark; a positive angle rotates the center mark counterclockwise

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
Call this method on each active view in which you want to insert center marks.
Before calling this method:
Call
IDrawingDoc::ActivateView
with the name of the view to activate.
Call
IDrawingDoc::ActiveDrawingView
to get a handle on the activated view.
Call
IDrawingDoc::InsertCenterMark3
if you want to insert one center mark in one view.
To...

Tools > Options > Document Properties > Centerlines/Center Marks > Scale by view scale
setting

.swDetailingCenterMarkScaleByViewScale,

.swDetailingNoOptionSpecified

Tools > Options > Document Properties > Centerlines/Center Marks > Scale by view scale
